fields.name: Simple Design
fields.description: Simple logos, small artwork, little amount of text and symbols.
fields.big_description: Simple logos, small artwork, little amount of text and symbols. It’s simple. People fall in love with brands, trust them and invest in them. This service package offers you the perfect beginning steps to climb your personal ladder of success.

fields.name: Basic Design
fields.description: Complex logo's, sketches, artwork, large amount of text and clipart.
fields.big_description: Complex logo's, sketches, artwork, large amount of text and clipart.. Basic doesn’t always mean being the same as everyone else. Here at DESIGNDROP, the basic package allows you to reach your audience with simplicity, without compromising the ultimate version of your brand.

fields.name: Complex Design
fields.description: Photo's, complex sketches, big artwork, large maps, etc.
fields.big_description: Photo's, complex sketches, big artwork, large maps, etc. This complex package may even change the definition of complex. What may be complicated for others, is deemed easy for us here at DESIGNDROP. We will sustain the intended vision for your brand - while you sit back, we do the work for you. Easy.

fields.name: Print preview
fields.description: We check your files, provide you with a print preview.
fields.big_description: We check your files, provide you with a print preview. As we all know, a first draft is essential in ensuring the final outcome is exactly the way you envisioned, this is why we offer a service of print preview to allow you to see a physical version of your ideas coming to life.

fields.name: Logo design
fields.description: We will help you to create a quality logo to promote your business.
fields.big_description: We will help you to create a quality logo to promote your business, when all the pieces of your brand come together, each piece should play it’s part to convey your brand’s identity. We can help create the initial piece - your logo - to make you stand out from the crowd , first things first.

fields.name: Advice
fields.description: A successful professional advice for a proper choice.
fields.big_description: A successful professional advice for a proper choice. Here at DESIGNDROP, we love listening to your personal visions for your brand. This is why our inbox is always open, whether you need advice on a colour scheme or your just all out of ideas for your brand - a member of our team are always ready to help you reach your highest potential.

fields.name: Adjust design
fields.description: Adjusting of the design for digital print up to three times.
fields.big_description: Adjusting of the design for digital print up to three times. Not entirely happy with your existing design? No worries. Here at DESIGNDROP, with a tap of a few magic buttons by our wonderful team, we can make your brands true fate come to life. We will work alongside your brand’s vision to reach the standard that you have been waiting for. Like magic.

fields.name: Brand design
fields.description: When it comes to branding, consistency is everything. We can help you!
fields.big_description: When it comes to branding, consistency is everything. We can help you! Not entirely happy with your brand, or dont have one yet? No worries. Here at DESIGNDROP, with a tap of a few magic buttons by our wonderful team, we can make your brands true fate come to life. We will work alongside your brand’s vision to reach the standard that you have been waiting for. Like magic.
